label: Active
description: Member will be able to resume access the Business Banking site.

label: Blocked
description: Member will not be able to temporarily access the Business Banking site due to security reasons (loss or compromise of user credentials, investigations, etc.)

label: Suspended
description: Member will not be able to access the business banking site temporarily due to reasons such as vacations or leaves.

label: Inactive
description: This is a final action, the member will no longer be able to access the Business Banking site.
